publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1189 Scott Barrie: Congratulations to Dunfermline Athletic Football Club-That the Parliament congratulates Dunfermline Athletic Football Club on reaching the 2004 Tennent's Scottish Cup Final; acknowledges that this will be the Pars' first such final since last winning the cup in 1968; notes that the club has qualified for European football for the first time since 1970, and wishes all four of Scotland's representatives in next season's European football competitions every success.
S2M-1189 Congratulations to Dunfermline Athletic Football Club (lodged on 21 April 2004) Brian Adam*, Tommy Sheridan*

S2M-1189 Scott Barrie: Congratulations to Dunfermline Athletic Football Club-That the Parliament congratulates Dunfermline Athletic Football Club on reaching the 2004 Tennent's Scottish Cup Final; acknowledges that this will be the Pars' first such final since last winning the cup in 1968; notes that the club has qualified for European football for the first time since 1970, and wishes all four of Scotland's representatives in next season's European football competitions every success. Supported by: Brian Adam, Tommy Sheridan

S2M-1189 Congratulations to Dunfermline Athletic Football Club (lodged on 21 April 2004) Bill Butler*, Colin Fox*, Mr Mark Ruskell*, Christine May*, Murray Tosh*, Phil Gallie*, Tricia Marwick*, Jackie Baillie*, Mike Watson*, Bruce Crawford*, Mr Brian Monteith*, Rosie Kane*
S2M-1189 Congratulations to Dunfermline Athletic Football Club (lodged on 21 April 2004) John Swinburne*, George Lyon*, Karen Gillon*, Bristow Muldoon*
S2M-1189 Congratulations to Dunfermline Athletic Football Club (lodged on 21 April 2004) Trish Godman*
S2M-1189 Congratulations to Dunfermline Athletic Football Club (lodged on 21 April 2004) Mr Jamie Stone*
S2M-1189 Congratulations to Dunfermline Athletic Football Club (lodged on 21 April 2004) Helen Eadie*
